definitions.definition: The upper and widest of the three bones that make up each side of the hipbone .
The ileum , part of the small intestine (in modern usage, misspelling of ileum ).

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The upper and widest of the three bones that make up each side of the hipbone .
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy , obsolete ) The ileum , part of the small intestine (in modern usage, misspelling of ileum ).
